citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The Chair of the Institutional Care and Use Committee became unable to fulfill that role as of Jan. 3rd, 2022. A new Chair
was appointed effective Feb. 1st. The IACUC was not duly constituted between those dates. Per this section of the
regulations, the Committee shall be composed of a Chairman and at least two additional members.
To remain corrected from this point forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives and the Institutional Official.
End Section

narrative:
2.31(b)(2) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The Chair of the Institutional Care and Use Committee became unable to fulfill that role as of Jan. 3rd, 2022. A new Chair 
was appointed effective Feb. 1st. The IACUC was not duly constituted between those dates. Per this section of the 
regulations, the Committee shall be composed of a Chairman and at least two additional members. 
 
To remain corrected from this point forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives and the Institutional Official. 
 
End Section
